translations: 复印机（photocopier 的复数）；影印机

sentences.sentence: The place has no electricity at all, no photocopiers, all the things that you just take for granted here, they just won't be there any more.
sentences.translation: 这个地方根本没有电，没有复印机，所有你认为在这里理所当然的东西，都将不再存在。

sentences.sentence: Crooks are using the latest laser photocopiers to produce millions of fake banknotes.
sentences.translation: 骗子们用最新型的激光影印机制作出了上百万的假钞。
复印机打印出来是二维的。
